skills.skill: Knowledge of Cutting and Filling Grade

duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a variety of heavy equipment for excavation and construction.
Follow company safety procedures and report problems to superiors.
Perform routine inspection and maintenance of equipment.
Possess knowledge of moisture condition, cut grade, and loading trucks.
Specialize in operating excavator, dozer, roller, or motor grader.
Pass drug test and criminal background check.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED equivalent
